name: Sheriff Thomas 2
description:
Sequel to the award-winning action-platformer, Sheriff Thomas. Play as the sheriff once more, along with his unlikely ally, Private Ben, as you foil a plot to unleash weaponized landsharks onto the world. Yeah, that's right -- landsharks.

This, too, is a game from my high school days. Despite the outrageous plot, I'm kinda proud of how this turned out. The levels use a GoldenEye-like nonlinear structure to facilitate objective-based gameplay rather than straightforward point-a-to-point-b challenges. Love it or hate it, Sheriff Thomas 2 is a wild ride.
